response.name: Update Post By Id with 2 that exists

item.description:
> 1\. MySQL setup in pom.xml and in application.properties mysql-connector-j  
2\. Updated MySQLQuerie.sql  
3\. Used @Entity form jakarta from spring-boot-Starter-data-JPA Dependency  
4\. @Entity name will create same in Database @Id \[PK\] @GenerateValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)  
5\. Add - JPA Repository Package > PostRepository.java Interface extends JpaRepository with its DataType in TableName, PK type<Posts, Integer>  
6\. Add - RequestDto and ResponseDto ()

item.name: Part4 Add(Tags, ManyToMany, Join)

item.description:
> Part 4 -  
1\. Added Tags in MySQL DB  
2\. (@ManyToMany(cascade ={CascadeType.ALL}), @JoinTable(name="p_t",jointColumn = {@JointColumn(name="post_id"), inverseJointColumn = {@JointColumn(name="tag_id")})) Set<Tag> tags = new HashSet<>();  
3\. changed PostRequestDto and ResponseRequestDto  
4\. While Create Post, check tag if Exists then don&#x27;t add  
5\. While Getting RequestDto -> alter Data Using Stream().map(()->Set<Tag> new Tag()) and then -> store in Post Entity Repository DB -> Return Stream.Map again back to Set of Strings

item.name: Part5

item.description:
> 1\. MySQL setup in pom.xml and in application.properties mysql-connector-j  
2\. Updated MySQLQuerie.sql  
3\. Used @Entity form jakarta from spring-boot-Starter-data-JPA Dependency  
4\. @Entity name will create same in Database @Id \[PK\] @GenerateValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)  
5\. Add - JPA Repository Package > PostRepository.java Interface extends JpaRepository with its DataType in TableName, PK type<Posts, Integer>  
6\. Add - RequestDto and ResponseDto ()

item.name: Part6

response.name: get Post By title id Copy

item.description:
> 1\. MySQL setup in pom.xml and in application.properties mysql-connector-j  
2\. Updated MySQLQuerie.sql  
3\. Used @Entity form jakarta from spring-boot-Starter-data-JPA Dependency  
4\. @Entity name will create same in Database @Id \[PK\] @GenerateValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)  
5\. Add - JPA Repository Package > PostRepository.java Interface extends JpaRepository with its DataType in TableName, PK type<Posts, Integer>  
6\. Add - RequestDto and ResponseDto ()
